holidays.title: International Day of Argania
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate argan trees on the International Day of Argania with us!

holidays.title: Micronesia Constitution Day
holidays.description: We’re journeying to Micronesia to celebrate their Constitution Day. Join us right here, right now!

holidays.title: Mother Ocean Day
holidays.description: Prepare to surf as we celebrate one of the most important aspects of life on Earth.

holidays.title: Mother's Day Mexico
holidays.description: Celebrate with us the unquestionable love of all mothers on this special day.

holidays.title: Mothers at the Wall Day
holidays.description: It's time to give your mother a warm hug to express gratitude for her unwavering love.

holidays.title: National Clean Your Room Day
holidays.description: We can all admit our rooms can get chaotic from time to time.

holidays.title: National Golf Day
holidays.description: Ready? Let’s lace up, grab those golf clubs, and perfect those swings today!

holidays.title: National Lipid Day
holidays.description: Here’s how you can make a difference in the lives of people with dyslipidemia.

holidays.title: National Ship Via Rail Day
holidays.description: You’ll want to catch this train to learn more about the history of shipping.

holidays.title: National Small Business Day
holidays.description: Ready to seize the day? Read on to be inspired by small business owners' achievements.

holidays.title: National Veal Ban Action Day
holidays.description: Put down your forks. We’re fighting for animal rights this National Veal Ban Action Day.

holidays.title: National Washington Day
holidays.description: Raise your glasses, it's time to toast the lush bountifulness of the Evergreen State.

holidays.title: One Day Without Shoes
holidays.description: Take off your shoes, go about your day, and raise awareness about the holiday.

holidays.title: Trust Your Intuition Day
holidays.description: Channel your inner superhero as we apply the power of intuition for good.

holidays.title: World Lupus Day
holidays.description: Spread the news and join the fight against lupus as we mark World Lupus Day.

holidays.title: Bono’s Birthday
holidays.description: A passionate singer, songwriter, and humanitarian, he’s made an impact in more ways than one.

holidays.title: Corey La Barrie’s Birthday
holidays.description: From creating videos for fun to becoming a well-known YouTuber, his entertaining videos live on.
